alert.note: Alert for Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Upper Bucks; Western Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 9:32PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...AN AREA OF SNOW WILL AFFECT HUNTERDON...NORTHWESTERN MERCER...SOUTHWESTERN SOMERSET...CENTRAL MONTGOMERY AND BUCKS COUNTIES... At 931 PM EST, an area of snow was located over Dublin, or 21 miles southeast of Allentown, moving east at 40 mph. Locations impacted include... Ewing, Lansdale, Princeton, Quakertown, Perkasie, Doylestown, Byram, Souderton, Bedminster, Flemington, Chalfont, Tinicum, High Bridge, Hatfield, Clinton, Pennington, New Hope, Dublin, Hopewell and Ferndale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 13 and 21. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 71 and 75. A winter weather advisory is in effect for the area. Please monitor local media outlets and the National Weather Service for further statements. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Upper Bucks; Western Montgomery
